title: What is the sneakiest way you guys have cheated on an exam?
body:
If you say you have never, you are not only lying to us, but yourself as well.

Anyways. What is the sneakiest way YOU have cheated?

Yesterday in one of my exams we had to use our own laptop. 50 multiple choice questions. So my table is a bit far away from the professor BUT my laptop screen faces him. So what I did was dim the laptop screen, tilt the screen forward even more, and check for a reflection of him to see if hes looking at me or at his own computer. Right when he looked at his own computer I immediately open a new tab and copy paste.

I ended up getting a 60. Funny thing is that the test was worth only 5% of our grade.
